Frequently Asking Questions (FAQ).
Short Answers (SA).

Find your question

Is it possible to compare the information I had placed to the 1GARD system with my regular credit card when I use them together?
How can I prolong my account in one year?

Is it possible to compare the information I had placed to the 1GARD system with my regular credit card when I use them together?

No way. When the merchandiser accepts 1GARD card & any credit card together he can see the number only. In return he receives statistics describing customer groups. Never the single record. Never the single client.

How can I prolong my account in 3 months?

You can keep your activated account in 3 months by updating it. You will need to visit the 1GARD updating page. It is easier then to get a new one.

 

Get the 1GARD ACCESS CARD. No fee required.
